meanings.definition: The small projection of cartilage opposite the tragus of the ear.
meanings.sent1: The antitragus helps in directing sound waves into the ear canal.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her antitragus while adjusting her earphones.
meanings.sent3: The antitragus seemed to have a mind of its own, wiggling whenever music played.
meanings.sent4: His antitragus stood out like a tiny island amidst the sea of his ear.
meanings.sent5: The antitragus, like a tiny guardian, protected the entrance to his ear canal.

meanings.definition: The fleshy prominence on the inner side of the external ear.
meanings.sent1: The antitragus felt soft to the touch, unlike the tragus.
meanings.sent2: She adorned her antitragus with a small, delicate earring.
meanings.sent3: The antitragus blushed when complimented on its unique shape.
meanings.sent4: Her antitragus seemed to listen intently to every whispered secret.
meanings.sent5: The antitragus, like a loyal companion, accompanied her through every conversation.
